Summary: 3 orbs came towards me, stopped above house across the street, hovered, then assend to a very large

divs: sighting detailsi went outside at 10:12 on saturday june 18, 2011 to feed my cat. i noticed a bright yellow light moving real slow towards me, after a few seconds another light turned on and then a few seconds another light turned on. the lights were so bright that there was a halo around each orb. the 1st orb changed from yellow to red ( it seemed to flow from yellow to red, like water sloshing from side to side slowly) and the other 2 orbs stayed yellow. the night was cloudy at about 800 to 900 foot cloud cover. these orbs are so bright that they light up the bottom of the clouds. the orbs stopped above the house across the street from me and hovered for about 20 to 30 seconds, these orbs are about 100 feet off the ground. i ran about 12 feet into my house and grabbed my binoculars (10x50)and started watching them. they started to ascend and i followed them up for a few seconds and then looked ahead to see where they might be going. that's when i saw a "mothership" at about 400 to 500 feet above me. this ship was so big that the boeing jumbo transport plane would fit inside this ship. it was just hovering with no noise. i looked back to the orbs and watched them go to the back and bottom of the ship and go into the ship. all 3 orbs went out at the same time. the orbs light up the bottom of the ship and it is still a dark color. the sky above the ship is grey cloud cover so the dark ship stands out. the "mothership" hovered for 20 to 30 seconds, then slowly started to move to the sse. after about 15 to 20 seconds the ship just vanished instantly. there was no fast acceleration, no vapor trail, it didn't go through the clouds, it just vanished instantly. i was standing on my front porch yelling for anyone to see this but no one was around. i looked in the house and i could see my tv cable box and it was 10:15 when it all ended i reported it to ufosnw and william puckett checked the radar data and there was a hit at exactly the time i had reported and exactly the place i said it was. it's hard for me to express all of the sighting in this email but i tried my best. i can convey more if it was in person. thanks (name moved to fi box) cms 12\09\11 19:37 cst flg
